# The `SmallVectorStorage` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

We need the storage to be properly aligned even for small-size of 0 so that the pointer math in <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#aff209a96323a14068980fd74f1fa53df">SmallVectorTemplateCommon::getFirstEl()</a></em> is well-defined. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

We need the storage to be properly aligned even for small-size of 0 so that the pointer math in <em><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#aff209a96323a14068980fd74f1fa53df">SmallVectorTemplateCommon::getFirstEl()</a></em> is well-defined.

Definition at line 1117 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">SmallVector.h</a>.
